quotes.quote: Lack of direction, not lack of time, is the problem. We all have twenty-four hour days.
The successful warrior is the average man, with laser-like focus.
Instead of focusing on how much you can accomplish, focus on how much you can absolutely love what you're doing.
The key to success is to focus our conscious mind on things we desire, not things we fear.
It was better to focus on the good and what we had than to focus on what we had lost and were losing.
Take five minutes to center yourself in the morning set your intention every day.
When you stay focused and keep a commitment you create momentum, and momentum creates momentum.
The sun's energy warms the world. But when you focus it through a magnifying glass, it can start a fire. Focus is powerful.
What you stay focused on will grow.
Concentrate all your thoughts upon the work at hand. The sun's rays do not burn until brought to a focus.
Don't dwell on what went wrong. Instead, focus on what to do next. Spend your energies on moving forward toward finding the answer.
My success, part of it certainly, is that I have focused in on a few things.
Being selective doing less is the path of the productive. Focus on the important few and ignore the rest.
Focusing is about saying No.

Focus is the key to accomplish what is necessary easy word to spell, it contains only five letters but it is probably one of the most powerful words there are in order to move forward with confidence and with the expected results.
Focus on your goals, not your fear. Focus like a laser beam on your goals.
I don't focus on what I'm up against. I focus on my goals and I try to ignore the rest.
Very occasionally, if you pay really close attention, life doesn't suck.
Always focus on the front windshield and not the review mirror.
Most people have no idea of the giant capacity we can immediately command when we focus all of our resources on mastering a single area of our lives.
You don't get results by focusing on results. You get results by focusing on the actions that produce results.
You must stay focused on the end result to achieve your goals.
The ego is nothing other than the focus of conscious attention.
Since you need to push yourself to follow a new set of habits, you need to keep your focus on your objectives. You need to remind your mind of your main reason to adopt these new habits.
Focus 90% of your time on solutions and only 10% of your time on problems.
It is during our darkest moments that we must focus to see the light.
Life is short. Focus on what really matters most; you should change your priorities over time.
Focus on your strengths, not your weaknesses. Focus on your character, not your reputation. Focus on your blessings, not your misfortunes.
One of the secrets of a successful life is to be able to hold all of our energies upon one point, to focus all of the scattered rays of the mind upon one place or thing.
It's important to focus on what we do best and master one craft at a time.
